title: Incorrect 'Build' popup action enablement
description: The 'Build' popup action is incorrectly enabled even when a manual build is not required.
OB: The 'Build' popup action is enabled even when the build is already done automatically.
EB: The 'Build' popup action should only be enabled when a manual build is required.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Check if the 'Build' popup action is enabled when the build is already done automatically.
3. Verify that the 'Build' popup action is only enabled when a manual build is required.
